sentences.en: A website need not cannibalise existing sales.
sentences.cn: 网站并不妨碍目前的销售。

sentences.en: All of the code book may be specified in the preamble website.
sentences.cn: 本书全部程序代码可由前言中指定网站下载.

sentences.en: Check out our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
sentences.cn: 请登录我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk查看。

sentences.en: For details visit our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请访问我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk。

sentences.en: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.cn: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

sentences.en: Go to the website today and you can unsubscribe online.
I found this information on their website .
sentences.cn: 我在他们的网站上发现了这一信息。

sentences.en: I heard the purity test website is gonna start posting pictures to illustrate the questions.
sentences.cn: 我听说纯洁测试的网站会贴出照片来举例说明问题.

sentences.en: So, your boyfriend was the one running the purity test website, right?
sentences.cn: 你男朋友就是运行纯洁测试网站的人, 对 吧 ?

sentences.en: The old official club website address has been taken over by cybersquatters.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部原来的官方网址已经被人抢注了。

sentences.en: The website shows the legend of concerned skin cancer and photo.
sentences.cn: 网站展示有关皮肤癌的图例和相片。

sentences.en: the website that gives you the downlow on the best movies
sentences.cn: 为您提供最优秀电影情报的网站

sentences.en: Welcome to my new website! It may not look much at the moment, but great oaks from little acorns grow!
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到我的新网站. 它现在可能微不足道, 不过万丈高楼平地起嘛.

sentences.en: What was the name of the martial art website you mentioned earlier?
sentences.cn: 你之前提到的那个武术网站是什么来着?

sentences.en: Word content must match with the actual content photograph of the website!
sentences.cn: 字内容一定要与网站的实际内容相匹配!

sentences.en: You can look up the rules on a website and apply them.
sentences.cn: 浏览一下网站就可以查阅到相关法律条文,随即应用.

trans.tran_en: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization
